title: Marian Bantjes' has a new site
content:
[Marian Bantjes](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Marian%20Bantjes) recently announced the redesign of her portfolio site, [http://www.bantjes.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329175500/http:/www.bantjes.com/). Her work is absolutely beautiful and the new site showcases it better than before. Be sure to check out the collaboration with [Stefan Sagmeister](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Stefan%20Sagmeister).

(Congrats Marian on the relaunch! Looking forward to unleashing your work in the upcoming _Font 005_ to the world again. =)
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: A fantastic showcase for drop-dead gorgeous work.
